name: SyncroMSP
natural_language_description: 这是 SyncroMSP 节点。主要用于: Gets data from SyncroMSP

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: contact

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getAll
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create new RMM Alert
Get Many (值: getAll) - Retrieve many RMM Alerts

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 25

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}

ticketId.name: ticketId
ticketId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Ticket ID | (必填项)

contactId.name: contactId
contactId.description: Delete a specific contact by ID
contactId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact ID | 作用: Delete a specific contact by ID | (必填项)

alertId.name: alertId
alertId.description: Mute the RMM alert by ID
alertId.natural_language_description: 参数名: RMM Alert ID | 作用: Mute the RMM alert by ID | (必填项)

muteFor.name: muteFor
muteFor.description: Length of time to mute alert for
muteFor.natural_language_description: 参数名: Mute Period | 作用: Length of time to mute alert for
